snippet.title: Kirakira Slimes - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Kirakira Slimes’ First Early Access trailer. Get ready for a physics puzzle adventure with slimes! Discover the vibrant land of KiraKira Slimes. Can you handle a screen full of bright and adorable friends?

Kirakira Slimes will be available on Steam on May 10, 2024.

https://www.instagram.com/etherdreams_/
https://twitter.com/etherdreams

#kawaii #kirakiraslimes #indiegame #puzzle #cute #indie #videogame #juegoschilenos
